title: How do I forward a message or send a message to multiple recipients?
answer: To forward a text message: Touch and hold the text message, choose Forward, enter a recipient, and send the message. [[To send a text message to multiple recipients: Create a text message, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109321), select the desired recipients, and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109322) in the upper right corner. You can send a text message to up to 100 recipients at a time.]()]()
